title: Sunny 2bdrm in Victorian Red Brick Rowhouse, Great Location!
posting_body: Sunny Lakeview/Roscoe Village 2-bedroom apartment in a lovely 6 Unit red Victorian Rowhouse with high ceilings, private deck, hardwood floors, and eat-in kitchen w/ dishwasher, in a stunning vintage Victorian Red Brick Rowhouse!
Walk to all your favorite Wrigleyville area shops and restaurants!
* 2 large queen-size bedrooms with ample closet space
* Lots of kitchen cabinets and counter space
* Hardwood floors and natural original woodwork throughout
* Laundry room with three washers and three dryers
* 3 blocks West of Southport for shops and restaurants
* 1 block to Paulina Brown Line "L" stop.
* One block east to Starbucks, restaurants, nightlife, and shopping on Lincoln Avenue -- Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, and  Target within walking distance.
We have been in business since 1968 and do business as Central City Management.
We are family-owned and managed and care about our tenants and their apartment homes.
You are encouraged to view current and former tenants' ratings on Yelp and Google.
